channel.title: Interesting Files on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Interesting Files on TLDRBins

item.title: Find
item.description: Linux Locate a File locate <FILE> Files of Type 'File' find . -type f Find and Open find / -name <FILE> -exec cat {} \; SetUID and SetGID Files find / -type f -user root \( -perm -4000 -o -perm -2000 \) 2>/dev/null -ls Files Owned by User find / -user <USER> -ls 2>/dev/null | grep -v -e " \/proc" -e " \/sys" Files Owned by Group find / -group <GROUP> 2>/dev/null | grep -v -e ^/proc World Writable Files and Directories (Exclude Sticky Bit) find / -type f,d \( -perm -0002 -a !
